content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- A Stone Furnace designed for smelting iron ore into iron plates. After being crafted and placed, it received 10 iron ore and 5 coal as inputs. The smelting process yielded 6 iron plates (with leftover iron ore remaining in the furnace), establishing this furnace as the core processing facility in the production chain.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Harvesting Proximity Error  
  – Ensure the agent is positioned within immediate reach of the resource patch before initiating any harvesting command. Repeated attempts to harvest additional wood failed due to the agent being out of range.

• Inventory Verification for Placement  
  – Confirm that the required entity exists in the inventory prior to attempting placement. The failure to place the Stone Furnace stemmed from attempting to place an entity that was not yet available.
